title: Apidura Innovation Lab packs a boxy 1.5L Hydration Bladder into your bikepacking bags
content:
Apidura thinks their new Innovation Lab’s boxy Hydration Bladder is now the most efficient way to haul more water in your bikepacking setup, better filling the space in your frame bag than water bottles alone.
